hero.name: Amr Ahmed
hero.title: Front-End Developer
hero.description: Front-End Developer expert in React JS, JavaScript, TypeScript, and Redux, with extensive experience delivering high-quality, SEO-friendly web applications. Skilled in creating responsive interfaces using HTML5, CSS3, and modern front-end tools. Proven track record enhancing UI/UX and ensuring seamless experiences across devices. Experienced in Agile environments, contributing innovative solutions and optimizing performance.

apiIntegration.title: API Integration
apiIntegration.subtitle: REST / GraphQL
apiIntegration.description: Connecting front-end interfaces to APIs and handling loading, error, and empty states properly.

bullets: Built responsive, accessible UI components and pages based on Figma designs using HTML, CSS, JavaScript and React.
Collaborated with a cross-functional team (UI/UX, backend, QA) using Agile workflow: sprint planning, standups, and task tracking.n
Translated design systems into reusable components, improving UI consistency across multiple screens.
Integrated REST APIs and handled loading/error states to deliver smooth user experiences.
Optimized performance (lazy loading, code splitting, asset optimization), improving Lighthouse scores and page speed.
Ensured cross-browser compatibility and mobile-first responsiveness across modern devices.
Participated in code reviews, followed team conventions, and maintained clean, scalable code.
Fixed UI bugs and handled enhancements based on QA feedback and client requests
Used Git/GitHub for branching, pull requests, and release coordination.
Developed SPA features using React (components, props/state, hooks).
Created reusable components and maintained a consistent design system across pages.
Consumed REST APIs with fetch/axios, implemented pagination/filtering, and error handling.
Managed routing with React Router and built dynamic UI based on URL parameters.
Applied basic state management patterns and improved code readability/structure.
Wrote clean, maintainable code and participated in code reviews with the team.

education.title: Education App
education.description: SkillBase is a modern online learning platform UI that showcases 350+ curated courses with clean cards, category filters, and ratings, focused on helping users learn and develop skills anywhere through an intuitive, responsive interface
